scripts.start: npm run build && docker run -p 3001:3001 -p 9229:9229 -e PROTOCAL=https -e GRAPHHOPPER_SERVICE_NAME=api.bikehopper -e PHOTON_SERVICE_NAME=api.bikehopper -e NOMINATIM_SERVICE_NAME=api.bikehopper -e FILE_SERVICE_NAME=api.bikehopper -e NAMESPACE=staging -e HOSTNAME=techlabor.org/v1 -e PORT=3001 --rm -it bikehopper-app:dev
scripts.start-nodocker: NODE_ENV=development PROTOCOL=http GRAPHHOPPER_SERVICE_NAME=localhost:8989 NAMESPACE= HOSTNAME= PORT=3001 node --inspect=127.0.0.1:9229 src/index.js
